item.title: Opposite 29 The Drive, 6th January
item.description:
Good morning. Over the festive period there has been paint dripping out of the back of a blue van which is regularly parked on our road. This isnâ€™t the first time that the same VAN has had paint spill out of the back. It has left a pole of hardened paint on the road and is very unsightly. The van belongs to a residence who lives on Brook Street, but he parks his van on our road constantly. He lives on the house on the corner entrance on the right hand side of our drive at 255 Brook Street. It may be worth speaking with him regarding this ongoing issue

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, The Drive, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
